message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we try $175?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! How about we try $155?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. How about we try $152?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $148?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. How about we try $149?
